trans-unit.source: Provides methods that you can use to create Ribbon controls for a Microsoft Office Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: 提供可用于创建 Microsoft Office 功能区自定义项的功能区控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example accesses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> instance of the project in the Ribbon code file of an Excel 2010 workbook project.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例访问<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>实例中的 Excel 2010 工作簿项目的功能区代码文件的项目。

trans-unit.source: This code uses methods in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object to create a drop-down item, a menu, and a button.
trans-unit.target: 此代码使用中的方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>对象以创建一个下拉列表项、 菜单和按钮。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [Walkthrough: Updating the Controls on a Ribbon at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[演练： 更新在运行时功能区上的控件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox" /> object that arranges and aligns controls on a custom Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建排列和对齐自定义功能区上的控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon box that arranges and aligns controls on a custom Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 排列和对齐自定义功能区上的控件的功能区框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox> automatically aligns Ribbon controls that you add to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox>自动对齐的你将添加到功能区控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" /> represents a button on a custom Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 表示自定义功能区上的按钮的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" />。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon button.
trans-unit.target: 功能区按钮。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonGroup" /> object that represents a group of buttons on a Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonGroup" /> 对象，该对象表示功能区上的一组按钮。

trans-unit.source: A group of buttons.
trans-unit.target: 一组按钮。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonGroup> controls can contain buttons, toggle buttons, menus, split buttons, and galleries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonGroup> 控件可以包含按钮，切换按钮、 菜单、 拆分按钮和库。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox" /> object that represents a check box on a Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox" /> 对象，该对象表示功能区上的复选框。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon check box.
trans-unit.target: 功能区复选框。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> object that represents a combo box on a custom Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> 对象，该对象表示自定义功能区上的组合框。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon combo box.
trans-unit.target: 功能区组合框。

trans-unit.source: A combo box presents a user with a text entry field and a list of choices in a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 组合框向用户提供一个文本输入字段，以及下拉列表菜单中的选项列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher" /> object that represents a small standardized icon on a group that can be used to open a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher" /> 对象，该对象表示组上的标准化小图标，可用于打开对话框。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a small standardized icon on a group that can be used to open a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示组上的标准化小图标，可用于打开对话框。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher> is displayed in the lower-right corner of a group by default.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher>右下角的一组默认显示。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown" /> object that represents a list of items that a user can choose from and a list of Ribbon buttons that a user can click.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown" /> 对象，该对象表示一个用户可从中选择的项列表，以及一个用户可单击的功能区列表。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 功能区下拉框控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown> can contain <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> objects and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown>可以包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>对象和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> object that represents an item in a drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 对象，该对象表示下拉框控件中的一个项。

trans-unit.source: An item in a Ribbon drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 功能区下拉框控件中的项。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonEditBox" /> object represents an edit box on a Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonEditBox" /> 对象，该对象表示功能区上的编辑框。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon edit box.
trans-unit.target: 功能区编辑框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonEditBox> control displays a labeled box in which users can type and edit text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonEditBox>控件显示带标签的框，用户可以键入和编辑文本。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> object that represents a control that displays a menu of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> objects and <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 对象，该对象表示显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 对象和 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" /> 控件的菜单的控件。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon gallery.
trans-unit.target: 功能区库。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that represents a group of controls on a Ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: 创建表示功能区选项卡上的一组控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon group.
trans-unit.target: 功能区组。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLabel" /> that represents a label on a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> or <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 或 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBox" /> 上的标签的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLabel" />。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon label.
trans-unit.target: 功能区标签。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> 实例的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <c>IRibbonExtensibility</c> object that represents a Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: 创建表示功能区自定义项的 <c>IRibbonExtensibility</c> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能区自定义项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Return the `IRibbonExtensibility` object in the `CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject` method of the `ThisAddin`, `ThisWorkbook`, or `ThisDocument` class of your project to return the Ribbon that you want to display in the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 返回`IRibbonExtensibility`对象在`CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject`方法`ThisAddin`， `ThisWorkbook`，或`ThisDocument`你的项目以返回想要显示在 Office 应用程序中功能区类。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a condition to determine which custom Ribbon to display.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例使用条件来确定要显示的自定义功能区。

trans-unit.source: This example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonManager%2A> method to create and then return an `IRibbonExtension` object that represents the custom Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 此示例然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonManager%2A>方法来创建，然后返回`IRibbonExtension`表示自定义功能区对象。

trans-unit.source: The syntax used in this example returns a Ribbon that was created by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中使用的语法返回已通过使用功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for returning a Ribbon that is created by using a **Ribbon (XML)** item is slightly different.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过使用创建的功能区的语法**功能区 (XML)**项会略有不同。

trans-unit.source: For more information about returning a **Ribbon (XML)** item, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关返回**功能区 (XML)**项，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu" /> that represents a menu on a Ribbon tab or on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 创建表示功能区选项卡或 Microsoft Office 菜单上的菜单的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon menu.
trans-unit.target: 功能区菜单。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new menu by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonMenu%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例通过使用创建新的菜单<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonMenu%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu" /> object that provides access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> objects in a Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu" /> 对象，该对象提供对功能区自定义项中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> 对象的访问。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> objects in a Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: 提供对功能区自定义项中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> 对象的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator" /> object that represents a separator control for a group or menu on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator" /> 对象，该对象表示功能区上某个组或菜单的分隔符控件。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon separator control for a group or menu on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 功能区上某个组或菜单的功能区分隔符控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> object that combines a button or a toggle button and a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 对象，该对象将按钮或切换按钮与下拉菜单组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon split button.
trans-unit.target: 功能区拆分按钮。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> object that contains one or more groups of controls on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 对象，该对象包含功能区上的一组或多组控件。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: 功能区选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> that represents a toggle button control on a Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 创建表示功能区上的一个切换按钮控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" />。

trans-unit.source: A Ribbon toggle button.
trans-unit.target: 功能区切换按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics" /> object that you can use to specify the position of a control, group, or tab in a Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics" /> 对象，可将其用于指定功能区自定义项中的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics" /> object that you can use to specify the position of a control, group, or tab in a Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics" />对象，你可使用功能区自定义项中指定的控件、 组或选项卡上的位置。
